brand_identity.name: Kleoniverse
brand_identity.mission: Premium streetwear for the digital generation. Where luxury meets the pavement.

headings.usage: Use for all major headings (H1-H3). Tight tracking (-0.02em) for impactful display.

body.usage: Use for all UI text, product descriptions, and metadata. High legibility.

mono.usage: Use for product SKUs, technical specs, and decorative micro-labels.

primary.description: Olive Green - The grounded anchor of the brand.

secondary.description: Bone/Warm Grey - Softer than white, adds premium feel.

accent.description: Burnt Sienna - For sale tags, urgency, and micro-interactions.

grid_styles.product_grid: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-x-6 gap-y-12

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold text-sm uppercase tracking-wide hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-foreground/20 text-foreground rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold text-sm uppercase tracking-wide hover:bg-foreground hover:text-background transition-all duration-300

cards.feature: bg-secondary/30 p-8 rounded-2xl border border-transparent hover:border-foreground/10 transition-colors

inputs.base: h-12 bg-transparent border-b border-foreground/20 rounded-none px-0 focus:border-foreground transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 font-medium

navigation.sticky_header: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-foreground/5 transition-all duration-300
navigation.mega_menu: absolute top-full left-0 w-full bg-background border-b border-border py-12 shadow-2xl opacity-0 invisible group-hover:opacity-100 group-hover:visible transition-all duration-300

instructions_to_main_agent: IMPERATIVE: Use the specific fonts 'Syne' and 'Manrope'. Add the Google Fonts import link to the index.html or CSS.
IMPERATIVE: Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the Hero section. Do not use a simple full-width slider.
IMPERATIVE: The Product Card must have a 'Quick View' button that appears on hover in the center of the image.
IMPERATIVE: Use 'Sonner' for all toast notifications (Added to Cart, Wishlist updated).
IMPERATIVE: Ensure the Navbar is sticky and has a backdrop-blur effect.
IMPERATIVE: Mobile menu must be a side drawer (Sheet component).
IMPERATIVE: For the 'Filters', use a Sidebar on Desktop and a Drawer on Mobile.
IMPERATIVE: Do not use default Shadcn buttons without the 'rounded-full' class overrides to match the brand.
IMPERATIVE: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for mock data. Do not leave src attributes empty.
accessibility_rules: Ensure all images have descriptive alt text.
Focus states must be visible (use ring-offset-2 ring-2 ring-primary).
Text contrast ratios must meet AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text).
Interactive elements must have a minimum touch target of 44x44px.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§ ðŸ’­ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
